SELECT tb_device.id,tb_device.imei,tb_device.ctime,tb_user.name AS studentName, tb_school.name AS schoolName, tb_class.name AS className FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_student ON tb_student.device_id = tb_device.id INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id INNER JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_student.class_id INNER JOIN tb_school ON tb_school.id = tb_class.school_id
tb_device.imei = #{imei}
AND tb_school.name LIKE '%' #{schoolName} '%'
ORDER BY id
SELECT tb_device.id,imei,tb_device.ctime FROM tb_device WHERE imei = #{imei} ORDER BY id

SELECT DISTINCT tb_device.id,imei,tb_device.table_id AS tableId,tb_device.ctime FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_table ON tb_table.id = tb_device.table_id INNER JOIN tb_group ON tb_group.table_id = tb_table.id WHERE tb_group.id = #{groupId} ORDER BY tb_table.number
